Package cpsc2150.extendedTicTacToe.models

Interface IGameBoard

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsGameBoard, GameBoard, GameBoardMem
    public interface IGameBoard
    A GameBoard is a 2D board of characters that allows you to insert characters onto the board.
    Constraints:
    size of a GameBoard = number_of_rows * number_of_columns
    InitializationEnsures:
    GameBoard contains nothing, i.e., a blank character and is number_of_rows * number_of_columns
    Defines:
    size_of_gameboard: Z number_of_rows: Z number_of_columns: Z number_to_win: Z

    • Method Detail

      • placeMarker

        void placeMarker​(BoardPosition marker,
                 char player)
        This method places the character player in marker on the position specified by the marker
        Pre:
        checkSpace(marker) == true
        Post:
        board[marker.getRow()][marker.getColumn()] = player
        Parameters:
        marker - the position on the board to place the character player
        player - the character that will be placed on the board

      • whatsAtPos

        char whatsAtPos​(BoardPosition pos)
        This method returns the character on the board at BoardPosition pos
        Pre:
        pos.getRow() < getNumRows() AND pos.getRow() >= 0 AND pos.getColumn() < getNumColumns() AND pos.getColumn() >= 0
        Post:
        board = #board AND whatsAtPos = board[pos.getRow()][pos.getColumn()]
        Parameters:
        pos - the BoardPosition that will be checked
        Returns:
        the character contained on the board at BoardPosition pos

      • getNumRows

        int getNumRows()
        This method returns the number of rows in the GameBoard
        Post:
        getNumRows = board[0].length && board = #board
        Returns:
        number of rows in the GameBoard

      • getNumColumns

        int getNumColumns()
        This method returns the number of columns in the GameBoard
        Post:
        getNumColumns = board.length && board = #board
        Returns:
        number of columns in the GameBoard

      • getNumToWin

        int getNumToWin()
        This method returns the number of tokens in a row needed to win the game
        Post:
        board = #board && getNumToWin = [num of tokens to win the game]
        Returns:
        number of tokens in a row needed to win the game

      • checkSpace

        default boolean checkSpace​(BoardPosition pos)
        This method determines if a position is available to place a token on
        Post:
        board = #board AND checkSpace [true iff] ( pos.getRow() < getNumRows() AND pos.getRow() >= 0 AND pos.getColumn() < getNumColumns() AND pos.getColumn() >= 0 AND whatsAtPos(pos) == ' ' )
        Parameters:
        pos - the BoardPosition that will be checked
        Returns:
        true if the character on the board at BoardPosition pos is ' ' (a whitespace character) and pos is in bounds

      • checkForWinner

        default boolean checkForWinner​(BoardPosition lastPos)
        This method checks to see if the last position resulted in a winner
        Pre:
        checkSpace(lastPos) == true AND lastPos = [BoardPosition on last play]
        Post:
        board = #board AND checkForWinner [true iff] ( checkHorizontalWin ( lastpos, whatsAtPos(lastPos) ) == true OR checkVerticalWin ( lastpos, whatsAtPos(lastPos) ) == true OR checkDiagonalWin ( lastpos, whatsAtPos(lastPos) ) == true )
        Parameters:
        lastPos - the location (BoardPosition) that was last player marker placed on the board
        Returns:
        true if the character at the last position placed on the board BoardPosiiton lastPos resulted in a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal win

      • checkForDraw

        default boolean checkForDraw()
        This method checks to see if the game has resulted in a tie
        Pre:
        checkHorizontalWin(BoardPosition lastPos, char player) == false AND checkVerticalWin (BoardPosition lastPos, char player) == false AND checkDiagonalWin (BoardPosition lastPos, char player) == false
        Post:
        board = #board AND checkForDraw [true iff] checkSpace( BoardPosition pos( 0...getNumRows() - 1, 0...getNumColumns() - 1 ) == false
        Returns:
        true if there is no position on board with a single blank space character false if there is 1 or greater blank space characters on the board

      • checkHorizontalWin

        default boolean checkHorizontalWin​(BoardPosition lastPos,
                                   char player)
        This method checks to see if the last marker placed resulted in getNumToWin() in a row horizontally
        Pre:
        checkSpace(lastPos) == true
        Post:
        board = #board AND checkHorizontalWin [true iff] whatsAtPos( pos( lastPos.getRow(), 0...getNumColumns() ) == player [in getNumToWin() consecutive positions]
        Parameters:
        lastPos - the last placed BoardPosition on the board
        player - the last placed character on the board
        Returns:
        true iff getNumToWin() characters in a row on the board in lastPos.getRow() have the same character

      • checkVerticalWin

        default boolean checkVerticalWin​(BoardPosition lastPos,
                                 char player)
        This method checks to see if the last marker placed results in getNumToWin() in a row vertically
        Pre:
        checkSpace(lastPos) == true
        Post:
        board = #board AND checkVerticalWin [true iff] whatsAtPos( pos(0...getNumRows(), lastPos.getColumn() ) == player [in getNumToWin() consecutive positions]
        Parameters:
        lastPos - the last placed BoardPosition on the board
        player - the last placed character on the board
        Returns:
        true if every row in the column lastPos.getColumn() is the character player

      • checkDiagonalWin

        default boolean checkDiagonalWin​(BoardPosition lastPos,
                                 char player)
        This method checks to see if the last marker placed results in getNumToWin() in a row diagonally
        Pre:
        checkSpace(lastPos) == true
        Post:
        board = #board AND checkDiagonalWin [true iff getNumToWin() diagonal places on the board contain the same character]
        Parameters:
        lastPos - the last placed BoardPosition on the board
        player - the last placed character on the board
        Returns:
        true if getNumToWin() characters on board in a row contain player is in a row diagonally

      • isPlayerAtPos

        default boolean isPlayerAtPos​(BoardPosition pos,
                              char player)
        This method returns whether the player is at the BoardPositiion
        Pre:
        pos.getRow() < getNumRows() AND pos.getRow() >= 0 AND pos.getColumn() < getNumColumns() AND pos.getColumn() >= 0
        Post:
        board = #board AND isPlayerAtPos [true iff] whatsAtPos(pos) == player
        Parameters:
        pos - the BoardPosition that will be checked
        player - the character that is compared to the character on the board at pos
        Returns:
        true if the character on the board at BoardPosition has the same character as the character player
